verbs.description: In [ARG1: a speech before the National Federation of Independent Businesses] [R-ARG1: that] [V: was] [ARG2: notable] [ARGM-CAU: both for the level of vitriol and repeated claims to be above not just the law , but facts] , one statement from Donald Trump stands out .
